price: 42. Waxaad iigu yeedhaan inaan ku gaa- loobo Alle oo la wadaajiyo (cibaadada) wax aan u heysan wax cilmi ah, aniguna waxaan idiinku yeedhaa xagga (Allaah) Adkaadaha Sarreeya, Denbi Dhaafka Badan.
arabic: تَدۡعُونَنِي لِأَكۡفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَأُشۡرِكَ بِهِۦ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞ وَأَنَا۠ أَدۡعُوكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡغَفَّٰرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: tadʿūnanī li-akfura bil-lahi wa-ush'rika bihi mā laysa lī bihi ʿil'mun wa-anā adʿūkum ilā al-ʿazīzi al-ghafāri
